ygData.subject: Re: dueling
ygData.msgSnippet: Duel them, the worst can happen is ya get ragged on and gotta walk back to loot your corpse.. No exp loss No looting of corpses ... From: atrocity apocalypse
ygData.messageBody:
Duel them, the worst can happen is ya get ragged on and gotta walk back to
loot your corpse..
No exp loss
No looting of corpses
----- Original Message -----
From: atrocity apocalypse <atrocity_apocalypse@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 12:41 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] dueling


> From: atrocity apocalypse <atrocity_apocalypse@...>
>
> This isn't really a shadow knight specific question, but I'll ask it
> anyway.
>
> What is the deal with dueling?
>
> Can the victor loot the loser?
>
> Do you lose exp if you lose?
>
> I'd love to know these things prior to challenging those pesky paladin
> and bard invaders in nektulos.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Atrocity
>
